CustomField.description: Must be an Organization-Wide Address. When the Invoice Setting's Send Invoice Emails Setting defines the email source as 'Invoice Entity Defined' the email address defined in this field will be used as the from / reply to email when emailing invoices.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Must be an Organization-Wide Address. When the Invoice Setting's Send Invoice Emails Setting defines the email source as 'Invoice Entity Defined' the email address defined in this field will be used as the from / reply to email when emailing invoices.
CustomField.label: Send Invoice Emails From Email
